values: Sustained By Sovereign Grace: How to Endure to the EndSustained By Sovereign Grace: How to Endure to the End

God promises in the new covenant to keep believers steadfast to the end. He works with all of his heart and all of his soul, with infinite joy, to help us endure.God promises in the new covenant to keep believers steadfast to the end. He works with all of his heart and all of his soul, with infinite joy, to help us endure.
